ticket.title: Omission in activerecord/RUNNING_UNIT_TESTS
ticket.original-body:
The file activerecord/RUNNING_UNITTESTS mentions that the database tables can be imported from test/schema/*.sql. For MySQL there are no such sql files present.
On the other hand there are a couple of Rake tasks for (re)building MySQL, Frontbase and PostgreSQL databases. These are not mentioned in the text file.

version.title: Omission in activerecord/RUNNING_UNIT_TESTS

version.body:
Please send me a PM at github ( nick : lifo ) and I'll add you to docrails http://github.com/lifo/docrails. And you can make the change yourself.
Cheers.
